email_body: i talked to fred today. i think he's in so lets assume it's a go. when is the last day to cancel and get our money back? Ina Rangel 04/04/2001 11:14 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Miami John, It looks like Fred is not going to do the Miami trip after all. Do you still want me to book it for the Financial group? If not, I will cancel the reservations that are on hold. -Ina
